thread.title: Big surprise at this Hilton -
thread.title_full: Big surprise at this Hilton - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: McGuireTrips
title: Big surprise at this Hilton -
text: So you check into a Hilton expecting a high quality, no-surprises comfortable stay, but at this particular one there is no room service. I was not warned of this in my reservation, nor at the front desk when I checked in. So when I got comfortable, took a shower and went to order something, I was very disappointed mostly because nobody told me about this beforehand. I love room service, so now I'm going to be very careful with this brand.
